name: Eric & Yannik
description:
Warning! This game is made to be intentionally bad and is not meant to be taken seriously! And do not sell this game! Not even as an NFT!

Eric, Yannik, Groen, or Berat must save Andrew from Don Glaber and his minions.

Menu Controls ↕ Select A Accept Selection
S Cancel Selection Gameplay Controls ↔ Horizontal Movement ↕ Vertical Aiming (Berat Only) ↓ Drop A Jump S Shoot P Pause
